oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-09-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 1, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performer Martha Carson, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Dale Potter, Marvin Hughes, June Carter, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Martha Carson; Chet Atkins; Carl Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Carl Smith introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Martha Carson -- Let The Light Shine On Me (Martha Carson) -- Carl Smith introduces Chet Atkins -- [Unidentified guitar instrumental] (Chet Atkins) -- Carl Smith talks -- Before I Met You (Carl Smith) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Carl Smith) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Potter, Dale; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jordanaires (Musical group); Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Carson, Martha
